name: Picture Cross Color
description:
Solve the puzzle to paint the picture! A treasury of picture logic puzzles, in glorious color!

■ 7 themed packs of COLOR puzzles to complete with more added regularly
■ 100s of COLOR puzzles to complete with more added regularly
■ Puzzles to suit every skill level, from Very Easy to Very Hard
■ Complete puzzle packs to reveal animated scenes

... Download free and start your Picture Cross Color adventure!

SUPPORT

Access the Help Center at any time from the pause menu (the icon in the top right corner of the game screen).

New to Picture Cross (a.k.a. Griddlers, Nonograms, Hanjie)? We've included a quick tutorial to get you started.

Picture Cross Color is free to play, but contains optional in-app purchases to unlock content more quickly.

www.picturecross.com/color
